content: stitch marker or scrap yarn **gauge** 14 sts = 3 7 5 cm across with smaller hook in pattern for hat band *for best fit always check your gauge* 14 half_double_crochet = 4 10 cm across with larger hook *for best fit always check your gauge* 1 https //sweetpotato3 com/crochet-cancer-challenge-2025-free-hat-patterns-to-support-cancer-patients/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/10/13/consuelo-beanie-crochet-pattern/ 3 https //lionbrand sjv io/vpbbdd
